title: Nine Inch Nails Fans?
content:
Hi all, new member but longtime guest : )

I was wondering if anyone knows what font they use for the "over north america 2008". the lights in the sky looks custom but if anyone recognizes it that would be helpful also!

PS: I will be at the venue in oakland in about two hours if you get it right I will send you a photo live ; )

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nin\_lights\_1b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132709/http:/typophile.com/files/nin_lights_1b.jpg) | 293.91 KB |
author: tedc

comments.content:
I don't know, but I could get somebody to ask Trent Reznor....

T

The "lights in the sky" text looks like any number of pixel fonts. You can probably find something very close on dafont... [http://www.dafont.com/bitmap.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132709/http:/www.dafont.com/bitmap.php "http://www.dafont.com/bitmap.php")
Awesome, thanks! Resea is pretty damn nice like at 14pt...
